summary: The Transit Captions Innovations Act directs the Secretary of Transportation to provide grants for the implementation of real-time transcription and translation technology in public transit systems. The goal is to improve the transit experience for individuals who are deaf, hard of hearing, and those with limited English proficiency. The bill amends existing sections of the United States Code (specifically Title 49) to authorize funding for these projects, specifying appropriations for fiscal years 2027 through 2031.
